title: Utilizing nitrogen, sulfur, phosphorus, and chlorine co-doped carbon dots as a fluorescent probe for determination of vancomycin in exhaled breath condensate
content:
Publication date: 15 September 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 17

Author(s): Kosar Shirazi, Zahra Karimzadeh, Mohammad Bagher Hosseini, Vahid Jouyban-Gharamaleki, Maryam Khoubnasabjafari, Jafar Soleymani, Elaheh Rahimpour, Abolghasem Jouyban
